DeckGods.name: Apollo
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated

DeckGods.name: Artemis
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space

DeckGods.name: Athena
DeckGods.description: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn

DeckGods.name: Atlas
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may build a dome at any level

DeckGods.name: Demeter
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space

DeckGods.name: Prometheus
DeckGods.description: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving

DeckGods.name: Hephaestus
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block

DeckGods.name: Minotaur
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level

DeckGods.name: Pan
DeckGods.description: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels

DeckGods.name: Ares
DeckGods.description: You may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker

DeckGods.name: Chronus
DeckGods.description: You also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board

DeckGods.name: Medusa
DeckGods.description: If possible, your Workers build in lower neighboring spaces that are occupied by opponent Workers, removing the opponent Workers from the game

DeckGods.name: Poseidon
DeckGods.description: If your unmoved Worker is on the ground level, it may build up to three times

DeckGods.name: Zeus
DeckGods.description: Your Worker may build a block under itself.
